entry.title: WIND WARNING, Drayton Valley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:37 a.m. MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning early this evening and ending overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 at times overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. High 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
